mapper.select: SELECT no,user_no,title,content,hit,reg_date,group_no,order_no,depth,name FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn,no,user_no,title,content,hit,reg_date,group_no,order_no,depth,name FROM (SELECT r.no, r.user_no, r.title, r.content, r.hit, r.reg_date, r.group_no, r.order_no, r.depth, u.name FROM rboard r, users u WHERE u.no = r.user_no AND r.title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY r.no DESC)) WHERE rn >=#{start} AND rn<= #{end}
SELECT COUNT(no) FROM rboard WHERE title like '%'||#{keyword} || '%'
